citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
Section 2.126(b) - Access and inspection of records and property: A responsible adult shall be made available to
accompany APHIS officials during the inspection process.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:30 AM on
05/27/2016.
Knocked on the door, no one was present. Called phone numbers provided by licensee. Spoke to an associate, who
was unable to contact licensee. Waited on the premises for 30 minutes Left voice mails.
